summary: This document is an email chain from March 1, 2019, where an individual requests video footage from cameras on Pearl Street for February 25, 2019, between 10:00 a.m. and 12:00 p.m. The request is made to someone named K-Teel, and the email appears to be forwarded within an organization, possibly related to security or property management.

persons.name: K-Teel
persons.context: The person being asked to provide or assist with obtaining video camera footage from February 25, 2019.

events.title: Request for Camera Footage
events.description: A request is made for video recordings from cameras on Pearl Street between 10:00 a.m. and 12:00 p.m.

keyFacts: A request for video camera footage from Pearl Street for February 25, 2019, between 10:00 a.m. and 12:00 p.m. was made on March 1, 2019.
The request was directed to an individual named K-Teel.
The document is part of an email chain that includes previous correspondence about camera-related issues from late 2018 and early 2019.
